channel.title: Teespring campaign for software folks (and hipsters)
channel.description:
I created my first Teespring campaign, and I meant to post it here before it closed, but better late than never. I want a t-shirt, but just need a few others for it to happen.
http://teespring.com/grooming-for-developers

item.title: Teespring campaign for software folks (and hipsters)
item.dc:creator: scojo
item.description:
Yeah, it was based on some ad I saw on SO. I thought it was good enough for a shirt. It was fun to do.

Read full topic
item.source: Teespring campaign for software folks (and hipsters)
